_doc.nagents: Number of agents (UEs). Also sets DNN input size in RL.
_doc.capacity: Replay buffer capacity per agent (number of transitions).
_doc.learningrate: Optimizer learning rate for RMSprop in Agent.
_doc.eps_increment: Linear increment added per step*episode to epsilon until eps_max.
_doc.batch_size: Minibatch size sampled from replay for optimization.
_doc.gamma: Discount factor for target Q computation.
_doc.nsteps: Max steps per episode (inner loop bound).
_doc.nupdate: Target network hard update period (every n steps).
_doc.plot_interval: Render frequency (steps or episodes depending on plot_x_axis).
_doc.plot_smooth_window: Moving average window size applied to curves.
_doc.plot_x_axis: 'steps' to plot per global step, or 'episodes' to plot per episode.
_doc.step_log_throttle: Write step_metrics.csv every N global steps (1 = every step).
_doc.checkpoint_interval: Save agent checkpoints every N episodes (0 disables).
